overview: Glenn is a disillusioned piano teacher, who once aspired to be a concert pianist. He is moving back to his parents house and is on the brink of giving up the piano for good when Kilov, a Russian gangster, offers him a unique opportunity: Â£10,000 if Glenn teaches his daughter Beethoven's "Fur Elise"... in a day.
tagline: Glenn is about to teach the hardest piano lesson of his life... for his life!
title: For Elsie
